text:
I see...!
So that's what happened!

I ended up buying it because it was so cheap. But I wonder
if she has been paying attention to us for a long time.

There was a part of me that thought,
"You could have reached out to me earlier."

I'm happy that you care about me and don't reach out to me,
and I'm also happy that you reach out to me...

...I also had a little feeling that
I might be noticed at a nearby store...

......
But I still couldn't say anything...

I could understand how that lady felt, what Hiori-chan
felt, and Meguru-chan's story...
Thank you, Mano.

I had no idea that I was being noticed, so I
thought I should at least say something.

When I thought about it, I realized that we would be affected
by someone saying something like "I bought something on sale"

Thinking about it now, I think she must have understood
how i felt and told herself, "Today is the last day."

Mm-hmm.
That's a lovely thoughtfulness...!

On the one hand, I wish they would talk to me normally,
but on the other hand, I don't like it when they're too aggressive.

In fact, when I heard "Shoulder roast is cheap,"
I felt kind of embarrassed.

I think she probably subconsciously felt that the
part about "idols buying cheap products..."
That's a totally private matter...

But...if she mustered up the courage to reach out to you
like that, I'm sure she'd think about what she could do.

Yeah, that's what I think. It's just ────
There's also the question of whether they want that, right?

......
That's a tough one...
Motion
